title: What is the most toxic thing you did as a fan? - Quora

response.answer_text: I do not think is toxic but I used to defend BTS back in 2017 (I was new to their fandom) whenever other fans would throw them shade and hate. Now I just scroll past the hate lmao, I got used to it and don’t care anymore. I would also occasionally read fanfiction. Some people are okay with them, but now I think fanfiction is quite toxic cause they reinforce the delusional behavior, and many of them romanticize violence/mental health issues or sexualize the boys. Other than that, I think I’ve been quite a good fan. It’s the first time I’ve ever fangirled over an artist.

I never really did anything toxic I think the worst things I did was cringe about the “HE/SHE IS MINE! “ fangirls/boys and get defensive whenever someone insulted me on a rp group chat. One person called me a little b**** and I got really defensive over it and i told them that they were being mean and I didn't like it (I was 9 at the time) they actually got removed from the amino which was sad since we had made up and became pretty good friends.
